name: sap-rfc-node-net
description: SAP RFC connector for Node.js using .NET backend - Production ready, zero runtime dependencies

scripts.postinstall:
node -e "console.log('
üì¶ SAP RFC Node.js Package Installed

‚ö†Ô∏è  SETUP REQUIRED:

1. Download SAP .NET Connector 3.0 from https://support.sap.com/nco
2. Copy both DLLs to:
   node_modules/sap-rfc-node-net/lib/bin/

   copy sapnco.dll node_modules\sap-rfc-node-net\lib\bin\
   copy sapnco_utils.dll node_modules\sap-rfc-node-net\lib\bin\

Then you are ready to use!

See SETUP.md for detailed instructions.
')"

author: Shubham Joshi <shubham_joshi1234>
